title: ‘SJB MPs NOT for Sale’; Sajith hits out at Basil
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa has openly hit out at Ex-Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa for attempting to ‘buy’ MPs from the Samagi Jana Balavegaya.
In a tweet on Wednesday (13), Sajith Premadasa said ‘Cheap power is when you have to buy it.’
